Structs/SpecPrepare.html#/s:Fe9SpecTools.name: simulatePresentViewController()
Structs/SpecPrepare.html#/s:Fe9SpecTools.abstract: Will touch view of a view controller in order to get loadView and viewDidLoad called, than manually calls viewWillAppear and viewDidAppear with animations disabled

Structs/SpecPrepare.html#/s:Fe9SpecTools.abstract: Set a new size for a view controllers view during runtime

Structs/SpecPrepare.html#/s:Fe9SpecTools.name: set(viewSize:height:)
Structs/SpecPrepare.html#/s:Fe9SpecTools.abstract: Set a screensize of a desired device on a view of your view controller, you can specify a custom height. Custom height might be useful when scrollviews are present
